verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: Otto Warmbier did not die in vain] , and says his death was crucial to today 's talks with North Korea .
President Donald Trump said Otto Warmbier [V: did] not die in vain , and says his death was crucial to today 's talks with North Korea .
President Donald Trump said [ARG1: Otto Warmbier] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: die] [ARGM-MNR: in vain] , and says his death was crucial to today 's talks with North Korea .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] said Otto Warmbier did not die in vain , and [V: says] [ARG1: his death was crucial to today 's talks with North Korea] .
President Donald Trump said Otto Warmbier did not die in vain , and says [ARG1: his death] [V: was] [ARG2: crucial to today 's talks with North Korea] .
